name: DIKU Systems Seminar
body:
## Calendar for seminar meetings

The schedule is planned a few week ahead.

**Time and place of seminar**: Every Thursday, 10-12, at DIKU (HCÃ˜), beginning on May 30 2013 and continuing until cancelled.

### Thursday, May 30 2013

This week we'll look at [The Dangers of Replication and a Solution](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=233330). The paper is presented by Kostas (@skipperkongen) without slides. Discussion moderator will be Vivek. There will be made [minutes]() available for this meeting.

### Thursday, June 6 2013

Papers to be decided by Kostas.

### Thursday, June 13 2013

No seminar this week (Kostas most likely away)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
